question: What could possibly be causing frequent urination problems in the daytime only?  I can sleep perfectly fine and if I have to can hold it for 2-3 cups, but it is really uncomfortable and most of the time i have to go when I get to about 4 ounces.  I used to be able to hold my bladder for 2 cups with no problems.  However, for a week before this problem started, I had to hold my bladder for 12 hours.  My problem began on a Sunday for the first time, however, the problem went away for four days when i went back to school.  When vacation started on that friday, I the problem came back and I have had this for 7 weeks now.  Is this stress related?  I went to the doctor and it's not a uti or diabetes
title: Daytime urination frequency
